item.title: Buffalo 8 Nabs Global Rights to Indian Films ‘The Exile,’ ‘Hucch’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Buffalo 8 Distribution has acquired worldwide rights to a pair of feature debuts from AK Studios: psychological folk horror “The Exile” and black-and-white silent comedy “Hucch.&#822
